~OVERALL RATING~
83%

~ SUMMARY ~
It's a classic! Portal 2 is so much fun, and the way the puzzles are laid out is a testament to world-class design. The game doesn't do much hand-holding, yet somehow lays out the levels in a way that gives you just enough information to figure things out... usually.

Some puzzles are super hard and require standing at a certain angle to see obscure distant places, so there's lots of experimentation.

The storyline is pretty amusing, and the way the characters evolve is great. A mind-expanding sci-fi FPS puzzle game.

Great coop puzzle game that take your hours and hours away. Even your brain will hurt a little bit.
Or was it only me?

Wow. 400 hours. A bit much for a 20 hour story game. Highly recommend, plenty of replay, story and speed running value. Even has level creator, but not that good. Highly recommend, and it also has plenty of content mods such as Portal Stories: Mel, which adds about 20 more hours.
10/10, would recommend.
This may be Valves best game. I don't like puzzle games but I love this one. I've put in at least 100 hours on Xbox and its worth buying on pc as well as console. its the best $10 game around.

Portal 2 is a pretty old game, but that doesn't stop it from being absolutely amazing. It's hilarious, well written, with a great plot, challenging puzzles, and some cool new features. You HAVE to play this game if you haven't already,
